props.bench: The number of items **outside** the user view that are rendered (even if they are not viewable); to help prevent empty white space when scrolling fast.
props.height: Height of the component as a css value.
props.itemHeight: Height in pixels of the items to display.
props.items: The array of items to display.
props.maxHeight: Sets the maximum height for the component.
props.maxWidth: Sets the maximum width for the component.
props.minHeight: Sets the minimum height for the component.
props.minWidth: Sets the minimum width for the component.
props.width: Sets the width for the component.
